general.headline: The $100 Billion Bitcoin Bet: How Treasury Companies Are Fueling The Crypto Run

asian.headline: 1 Absurdly Cheap Artificial Intelligence Stock to Buy Right Now
asian.summary: Alphabet recently posted some solid earnings numbers, and artificial intelligence isn't hurting its business, as some investors feared it might.

asian.headline: Big Tech Roars on AI Frenzy: ETFs to Play
asian.summary: MSFT and META soared on blowout earnings, with MSFT joining the $4-trillion market-cap and fueling ETF plays like XLK, VGT, MAGS and FNGS.

asian.headline: Meta Platforms, Microsoft, and Vertiv Announced Amazing News for Nvidia Stock Investors
asian.summary: The demand for AI compute continues to grow dramatically.

asian.headline: Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai Just Delivered Incredible News for Nvidia Stock Investors
asian.summary: Google parent Alphabet just raised its 2025 capex forecast by $10 billion, which could flow to AI hardware suppliers like Nvidia.

asian.headline: MICRON INVESTIGATION ALERT: Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C. is Investigating Micron Technology, Inc. on Behalf of Long-Term Stockholders and Encourages Investors to Contact the Firm - Micron Technology  ( NASDAQ:MU )
asian.summary: Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C. Litigation Partner Brandon Walker Encourages Investors Who Suffered Losses In Micron ( MU ) To Contact Him Directly To Discuss Their Options

asian.headline: Standex International  ( SXI )  Beats Q4 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
asian.summary: Standex (SXI) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +8.57% and +3.55%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

asian.headline: Cable One  ( CABO )  Lags Q2 Earnings Estimates
asian.summary: Cable One (CABO) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -60.75% and +0.08%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?
